enjug.erijan.games.yatzy.control

Interface RollBehavior

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RollBehaviorMaxiYatzy, RollBehaviorYatzy

    public interface RollBehavior
    Roll behavior interface for use with Yatzy and variants. Created by Jan Eriksson on 16/11/15.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void resetDice()
      Prepare dice for next player.
      void rollActiveDice()
      Roll dice not set to be saved by the player.
      void toggleActiveDie(GameDie die)
      Saves/unsaves dice for the player for next roll.

    • Method Detail

      • rollActiveDice

        void rollActiveDice()
        Roll dice not set to be saved by the player.

      • resetDice

        void resetDice()
        Prepare dice for next player.

      • toggleActiveDie

        void toggleActiveDie(GameDie die)
        Saves/unsaves dice for the player for next roll.
        Parameters:
        die - Specific die to activate/deactivate.
